diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $3$ units.
The line $AD$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
The line $AB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$ forming one side of the figure.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$ forming the other side of the figure.
